sentence: "When  Hamas  militants  stormed  parts  of  southern  Israel  on  Oct.  7,  they  killed  about  1,200  people  and  took  more  than  240  hostages  back  to  the  Gaza  Strip,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
Since  then,  Israel's    bombardment  and  invasion  of  Gaza  have  killed  more  than  15,000  Palestinians  there,  according  to  health  officials  in  Gaza.

Hamas'  ability  to  penetrate  Israeli  security  —  to  kill  and  kidnap  so  many  people  on  Oct.  7  —  prompted  many  Israelis  to  ask  whether  militants  had  help  from  Palestinians  elsewhere,  including  in  the  West  Bank.
